channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12147] Porting Online Config Change from 89-fb
item.description: This jira is to track the forward port of HBASE-8805 and HBASE-8544 implemented by Gaurav Menghani in 89-fb. This improves operational efficiency in managing clusters that are serving production traffic.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This is the initial patch, bringing together the Online Configuration with an application to update configs for compactions.

This message is automatically generated.

You know how to fix the heap size test Manukranth Kolloju? You changed 'size' of a base type. Run the test in your IDE to see what you need to fix. If you can't figure, come back and we'll help out....

Do you need annotations on public interface PropagatingConfigurationObserver extends ConfigurationObserver {

Looks like you added Reference to HStore and that is why TestHeapSize is failing.

Otherwise +1 on patch on skim. Very nice new feature. Needs fancy release note.
Fixing TestHeapSize. I checked the javadoc warnings on the precommit build, but can't seem to find where the 1 warning is coming from.

This is the javadoc warning:


[WARNING] Javadoc Warnings

[WARNING] /home/jenkins/jenkins-slave/workspace/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/MetaScanner.java:299: warning - @param argument "offlined" is not a parameter name.
I noticed that warning, but I don't think my patch had any changes in MetaScanner.java.
I agree it is not related.
+1 on commit (I can fix WARN on commit) Unless objection, I'll commit later today.

After this, the next patch would be to provide a strategy to trigger this config change. I had 2 options,
1) Provide an end point to let the regionserver know that it has to reload its config.
2) Let regionserver periodically check if the configuration has changes and trigger the configuration change when it detects that it happened.

Option 2 would be simpler to implement, but I feel that option 1 would be more safe and gives the admin more control. Will put up a patch for this idea shortly.
+1 to option #1

Committed to branch-1+. Thanks for the patch Manukranth Kolloju I added a release note. See what you think. Add in the link to the activation issue when it gets filed. Good stuff.

Oh, fixed the javadoc warning with an addendum post-commit.

    HBASE-12147 Porting Online Config Change from 89-fb -- JAVADOC FIX ADDENDUM



commit 962065de726d7f96cf49a96674032c3d0f189e3d

Author: manukranthk <manukranthk@fb.com>

Date:   Wed Oct 1 15:13:58 2014 -0700



    Online config change



    Summary: This diff is intended to forward port HBASE-8805 and HBASE-8544 implemented by Gaurav Menghani in 89-fb. This improves operational efficiency in managing clusters that are serving production traffic. The idea is to have a central configuration which can manage notifying the configuration observers. The observers in turn should update their local sta



    Test Plan: Unit tests



    Differential Revision: https://reviews.facebook.net/D24681



    Signed-off-by: stack <stack@apache.org>

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-1.0 #310 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.0/310/)

Reverted from branch-1. I applied it wrong and broke branch-1 build. Let me try and figure what I did amiss.

Yeah, I had to revert. CompoundConfguration is missing addBytesMap When I try to fix it up, it has dependency on Bytes class – there is stuff in Bytes that does not seem to have been backported. Any chance of looking at this Manukranth Kolloju else I'll dig in later t his morning.... Thanks.
Let me take a look in a half hour.

There was a change in the Bytes class to remove Writables and replace them with bytes. And as part of that some function names were changed as well. Hence this merge conflict. This is the change needed to fix the patch : https://reviews.facebook.net/F223347. I will attach the patch for branch-1

Patch for branch-1
I also had to fix the test classification for this one.

stack, I attached the patch that you've asked. Let me know if that works.
I have checked : mvn clean -DskipTests package

Pushed the branch-1 patch and the little javadoc fix again. Thanks Manukranth Kolloju for fixup.

Lets revisit using Writables for this stuff even in branch-1 in another issue.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
Forward port of HBASE-8805 and HBASE-8544 implemented by Gaurav Menghani in 89-fb. This improves operational efficiency in managing clusters that are serving production traffic. The idea is to have a central configuration which can manage notifying the configuration observers. The observers in turn should update their local state from the latest config. Minor caveats where configuration variables are corelated should be taken care of with additional care.

This patch is the server-part only. TODO is the activation, coming in a later issue.
